https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A9Roojb8irRKPyyhDKCRzVc16NI.jpg Follow the life of Pod as he moves to Bangkok from the country. Pod's new life starts with getting a job, losing a finger and dreaming about a girl. A movie were nothing is impossible, and just because you get killed by raining red helmets doesn't mean you have to stop driving a motorcycle taxi. Citizen Dog
